alert.note: Alert for Cooke (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 8:30PM CDT until April 04 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN COOKE COUNTY... At 830 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Ray Roberts Park Johnson Branch, or 9 miles south of Gainesville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Callisburg, Lake Kiowa, Ray Roberts Park Johnson Branch and Valley View. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection stay inside a sturdy structure and keep away from windows.
